      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Gets only the entities that have camera components.
      int[] FilamentInstance.getEntities()
      Gets the list of entities for this instance, one for each glTF node.
      int[] FilamentAsset.getEntities()
      Gets the list of entities, one for each glTF node.
      int[] FilamentAsset.getEntitiesByName(java.lang.String name)
      Gets a list of entities with the given name.
      int[] FilamentAsset.getEntitiesByPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
      Gets a list of entities whose names start with the given prefix.
      int FilamentAsset.getFirstEntityByName(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the first entity with the given name, or 0 if none exist.
      int[] FilamentInstance.getJointsAt(int skinIndex)
      Gets joints at skin index in this instance.
      int[] FilamentAsset.getLightEntities()
      Gets only the entities that have light components.
      int[] FilamentAsset.getRenderableEntities()
      Gets only the entities that have renderable components.
      int FilamentInstance.getRoot()
      Gets the transform root for the asset, which has no matching glTF node.
      int FilamentAsset.getRoot()
      Gets the transform root for the asset, which has no matching glTF node.
      int FilamentAsset.popRenderable()
      Pops a ready renderable off the queue, or returns 0 if no renderables have become ready.
      注释类型为Entity的com.google.android.filament.gltfio中的方法参数 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void FilamentInstance.attachSkin(int skinIndex, int target)
      Attaches the given skin to the given node, which must have an associated mesh with BONE_INDICES and BONE_WEIGHTS attributes.
      void FilamentInstance.detachSkin(int skinIndex, int target)
      Attaches the given skin to the given node, which must have an associated mesh with BONE_INDICES and BONE_WEIGHTS attributes.
      java.lang.String FilamentAsset.getExtras(int entity)
      Gets the glTF extras string for the asset or a specific node.
      java.lang.String[] FilamentAsset.getMorphTargetNames(int entity)
      Gets the names of all morph targets in the given entity.
      java.lang.String FilamentAsset.getName(int entity)
      Gets the NameComponentManager label for the given entity, if it exists.
      int FilamentAsset.popRenderables(int[] entities)
      Pops one or more renderables off the queue, or returns the available number.
